nodes.text: The Cvetaen system was a star system located within the Expansion Region of the galaxy. The star system designated as LCC-4-4-7 was located equidistantly from the Cvetaen system and the Sumitra system, another Expansion Region star system. A non-commissioned communications officer informed Moff Wilhuff Tarkin of this when stolen Imperial Corvette Carrion Spike was present in LCC-4-4-7.
